title: Colombo – Negombo road obstructed due to protest demanding LP gas
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Police states that a protest is currently underway by a group demanding for LP Gas by obstructing the Colombo – Negombo Road from Mahabage.
Colombo – Negombo road obstructed due to protest demanding LP gas
Government must explain reasons for declaring emergency – Human Rights Commission
